plot: Lithia, a beautiful bride, is forced to make the most important and dangerous decision of her entire life; a decision that will affect her family, her past, and her destiny.
title: The Union
plot_es: Lithia, a beautiful bride, is forced to make the most important and dangerous decision of her entire life; a decision that will affect her family, her past, and her destiny.
plot_en: Lithia, a beautiful bride, is forced to make the most important and dangerous decision of her entire life; a decision that will affect her family, her past, and her destiny.
